title: Fire Island National Seashore: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Come explore the seashore or bring the park into your own classroom. Field trips, materials for loan, and lesson plans with a variety of activities and resources are available to enhance your educational experience. All Curriculum Materials   Featured Curricula    Study Beach Dynamics and Much More Learn More     Field Trips Learn more about each of our sites and plan your next visit to Fire Island National Seashore. All Field Trips   Plan Your Field Trip    Bring Your Class Learn More     Traveling Trunks Packed with sand, samples, and shells, the Fire Island Treasure Chest is a great way to prepare for your Fire Island field trip, or to bring the Seashore into your classroom.  All Traveling Trunks   Traveling Trunk    Fire Island Treasure Chest Learn More
